Unmetered Calls For Internet Access In The Uk At

02 Jun 1999

According to the BBC, British Telecom is launching a toll-free number for Internet access at weekends. The catch? You have to be using BT's ISP.

\nThis may or may not be timed to co-incide with the telecoms strike planned for this weekend.
